name: Hot Day (sypdev)
description:
You play as an ice cube trying to avoid the sun! Make sure to go through tutorial! Have fun guys :)

Game made in 72h for Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam with theme: Keep It Alive.

Devlog coming soon on: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC65r29LsGVD3R8mnoGL_Afg

Controls:
WASD - movement
Space - jump
Left / Right mouse button - time manipulation
ESC - Pause

UPDATE

  • Fixed game breaking bug
